title: Bitcasino.io Support
author: Bitcasino.io Support
content: BITCOIN PREDICTOR APRIL How close can you guess the Bitcoin price on April 28th?Predict and get your share of the 15 mBTC prize...Here's the twist this month:If your winning prediction is posted before 15th of April, the reward will be boosted 10%.If we get 100 predictions for the game, all rewards will be boosted 20%!How to participate:1. PREDICT the BTC price for April 28th2. WRITE it in the thread in EUR3. ADD your Bitcasino usernameRules:* You can make up to 2 predictions: 1st = until 14th; 2nd = between 13th-24th (23:59 GMT).* You need to have at least 50 posts on Bitcointalk.* 3 winners will be decided based on the Bitcoin opening price listed at Bitstamp on April 28 @ 10:00 GMT.* 3 closest predictors will get 5 mBTC.* The winning amount has 1X wagering requirement.* We collect all the predictions and posts that are edited after will be disqualified. Play fair.Good luck y'all!Karl from Bitcasino.io> Our main Bitcointalk thread
